abstract: A former private-equity banker from JPMorgan Chase, John Sorice, has joined RBC Capital Markets, where he becomes a managing director in the firm’s United States financial sponsors group.

lead_paragraph: A former private-equity banker from JPMorgan Chase, John Sorice, has joined RBC Capital Markets, where he becomes a managing director in the firm’s United States financial sponsors group.

headline.main: RBC Capital Hires Private Equity Banker
